# activityItemsConfiguration

**Instance Property**

The custom object from an app built with Mac Catalyst that provides the items to share.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var activityItemsConfiguration: (any UIActivityItemsConfigurationReading)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this object to provide the set of items to share from your macOS window.

## Getting the Toolbar Items

- **delegate**: The custom object from your app that provides the items to share.
- **NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate**: An interface that provides the content to share from the macOS share sheet.
